int cal(int n) {
   int sum_1 = 0;
   int p = 1;
   for (; p < 100; ++p) {
     sum_1 = sum_1 + p;
   }

   int sum_2 = 0;
   int q = 1;
   for (; q < n; ++q) {
     sum_2 = sum_2 + q;
   }
 
   int sum_3 = 0;
   int i = 1;
   int j = 1;
   for (; i <= n; ++i) {
     j = 1; 
     for (; j <= n; ++j) {
       sum_3 = sum_3 +  i * j;
     }
   }
 
   return sum_1 + sum_2 + sum_3;
 }

void print(int n) {

  }

int cal(int n) {
int ret = 0;
int i = 1;
for (; i < n; ++i) {
ret = ret + f(i);
}
}

int f(int n) {
int sum = 0;
int i = 1;
for (; i < n; ++i) {
sum = sum + i;
}
return sum;
}

int cal(int n) {
int ret = 0;
int i = 1;
for (; i < n; ++i) {
ret = ret + f(i);
}
}

int f(int n) {
int sum = 0;
int i = 1;
for (; i < n; ++i) {
sum = sum + i;
}
return sum;
}

private static double sqrt(int number, double precision) {
double start = 0.0d;
double end = (double) number;
double mid = start + (end - start) / 2d;
while (meetRange(mid, number, precision)) {

if (mid * mid > number) {
end = mid;
} else if (mid * mid < number) {
start = mid;
} else {
return mid;
}
mid = start + (end - start) / 2d;
}
return mid;
}

private static boolean meetRange(double target, int number, double precision) {
return Math.abs(target * target - number) > precision;
}

}

}
}

}

}

int cal(int m, int n) {
int sum_1 = 0;
int i = 1;
for (; i < m; ++i) {
sum_1 = sum_1 + i;
}

int sum_2 = 0;
int j = 1;
for (; j < n; ++j) {
sum_2 = sum_2 + j;
}

return sum_1 + sum_2;
}

int cal(int n) {
int sum_1 = 0;
int p = 1;
for (; p < 100; ++p) {
sum_1 = sum_1 + p;
}

int sum_2 = 0;
int q = 1;
for (; q < n; ++q) {
sum_2 = sum_2 + q;
}

int sum_3 = 0;
int i = 1;
int j = 1;
for (; i <= n; ++i) {
j = 1;
for (; j <= n; ++j) {
sum_3 = sum_3 + i * j;
}
}

return sum_1 + sum_2 + sum_3;
}

const reverse1 = str =>
str
.split('')
.reverse()
.join('')

const reverse2 = str => str.split('').reduce((acc, value) => value + acc)

const reverse3 = str =>
str.length === 1 ? str : str.slice(-1) + reverse3(str.slice(0, -1))

const reverse4 = (str) => {
let newStr = ''
let size = str.length
let middle = Math.floor(size / 2)
let up = middle
let down = size % 2 === 0 ? middle - 1 : middle

for (; up < size && down >= 0; down--, up++) {
if (up != down) {
newStr = str[up] + newStr + str[down]
} else {
newStr = str[up]
}
}
return newStr
}

int cal(int m,int n) {
int sum1 = 0;
int i = 1;
for (; i<m, ++i) {
sum1 = sum1 + i;
}
int sum2 = 0;
int j = 1;
for (; j<n; ++j) {
for (; j < m; ++j) {
sum2 = sum2 + j;
}
}
return sum1 + sum2;
}

int cal(int n) {
int sum_1 = 0;
int p = 1;
for (; p < 100; ++p) {
sum_1 = sum_1 + p;
}

int sum_2 = 0;
int q = 1;
for (; q < n; ++q) {
sum_2 = sum_2 + q;
}

int sum_3 = 0;
int i = 1;
int j = 1;
for (; i <= n; ++i) {
j = 1;
for (; j <= n; ++j) {
sum_3 = sum_3 + i * j;
}
}

return sum_1 + sum_2 + sum_3;
}
